mapper.select: SELECT COT_ID, HOMEPAGE, OVER_VIEW, FIRST_IMAGE, FIRST_IMAGE2, ZIP_CODE, AREA_CODE, SIGUGUN_CODE, DONG_CODE, CAT1, CAT2, CAT3, ADDR1, ADDR2, MAPX, MAPY, WGSX, WGSY, MLEVEL, BOOK_TOUR, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_TEL, ADMIN_FAX, ADMIN_EMAIL, SET_STATUS FROM DATABASE_MASTER WHERE COT_ID = #{cotId}
